cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 12th Dec 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 12th Dec 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

Located on the upper floor with north facing, 180 degree, un-obstructed mountain and sea views.
A great choice for the budget conscious ANYONE wishing to immerse themselves in the most picturesque landscape views Kaikoura has to offer.
